HomePage.desc: a computer engineer working in the field of web development, mobile applications, and digital marketing since 2009

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.about me: I graduated from Al-Kafil University from the Department of Computer Technology Engineering in 2013 in Iraq, then obtained my second degree from Tambov State Technical University in 2020 in Russia. Now, I am in the third stage of my PhD program. I have worked in a variety of projects and applications related to computer technologies, and I am excited to continue researching and learning in this field
